definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

pinyin: ge4 ren2 shu4 zi4 zhu4 li3
ge4 ren2 fang2 hu4 zhuang1 bei4

definition: the master leads you to the door, the rest is up to you/you can lead a horse to water but you can't make him drink
pinyin: shi1 fu5 ling3 jin4 men2 , xiu1 xing2 zai4 ge4 ren2
containing_words.word: 師父領進門，修行在個人

definition: the second person/(fig.) someone else/third party

sentences.english: I have nothing but some personal belongings.
sentences.chinese: 我只帶了一些個人用品。

sentences.english: But as a private individual, I just ignore such people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果我是作爲個人，對這種人我就根本不予理睬。

sentences.english: Andre says here's a clear principle,the most particular.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈說這裏有一個明確的原則，最個人的。

sentences.english: Today girls are going for the women's individual all-around final.
sentences.chinese: 今天女孩子們要爲個人全能拼搏了。

sentences.english: There are also the purely personal predilections of each individual musician.
sentences.chinese: 每一個音樂家都有完全個人的偏愛。

sentences.english: Big brother says the paper is due tomorrow, or else.
sentences.chinese: 老師說，論文明天應交，否則後果由個人負責。

sentences.english: In 1999, ethnic unity and progress has been exemplary Linying advanced individuals.
sentences.chinese: 1999年，獲臨潁縣民族團結進步模範先進個人。

sentences.english: The newly discovered notes are nothing more than Jack's personal journal.
sentences.chinese: 新發現的筆記只不過是傑克的個人日記。

sentences.english: I will start from their own, the Japanese learn their advantages.
sentences.chinese: 我也會從個人做起，向日本人學習他們的優點。

sentences.english: A powerful personal growth tool is the 30-day trial.
sentences.chinese: 有一種個人成長的有效工具，叫做“30天試驗”。

sentences.english: Consult personal sites only when you are convinced of their reliability.
sentences.chinese: 只有在您確信個人網站的可靠性後才能利用它們。

sentences.english: First, the heavy burden of personal cost.
Oscillating along the track of time, we sea our insignificant.
sentences.chinese: 擺盪在時間的軌跡，個人者發現自己何其渺小。

sentences.english: For his own personal interest, Mr. Chen ratted on his government.
sentences.chinese: 陳先生爲了個人利益，背叛了他的政府。

sentences.english: We don't change things out of personal prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 不要因爲個人成見而改變事物的本來面目。

sentences.english: The worst personal development mistake didn't make the list.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有把最糟糕的個人發展錯誤列進表裏。

definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
